name: Pishu
description:
Pishu is a little adventure game, where you can play a fisherman called Wade. The aim is to find all the hints that are hidden in a level. It is a school project I made with 4 other students.

At the moment, only one level is playable but another level will be added soon. Also, for now there is no enemies but they will also be added later. 

To play, use the WASD (or ZQSD in azerty) keys. You can hit with the space bar, you can fish if you press F near water, and if you have fish, you can eat it by pressing R.
